column2: Jody J. Daniels and Benjamin Bell

column2: ABSTRACT
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=2 left-column right-indent font-largest column-top line-blank-line line-double-space line-space headchar-capital

column2: Listen-Communicate-Show (LCS) is a new paradigm for human
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=2 left-column full-justified aligned-line longer-tail headchar-capital

column2: interaction with data sources. We integrate a spoken language
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=2 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: understanding system with intelligent mobile agents that
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=2 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: mediate between users and information sources. We have built
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=2 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: and will demonstrate an application of this approach called
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=3 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: LCS-Marine. Using LCS-Marine, tactical personnel can
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=3 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-capital

column2: converse with their logistics system to place a supply or
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=3 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: information request. The request is passed to a mobile,
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=3 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-comma

column2: intelligent agent for execution at the appropriate database.
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=3 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-period

column2: Requestors can also instruct the system to notify them when
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=3 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-capital

column2: the status of a request changes or when a request is complete.
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-period

column2: We have demonstrated this capability in several field exercises
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-capital

column2: with the Marines and are currently developing applications of
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: this technology in new domains.
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period above-blank-line above-double-space above-line-space

column2: Keywords
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column right-indent font-largest aligned-line shorter-tail line-blank-line line-double-space line-space string-keyword headchar-capital

column2: Spoken language understanding, agents, dialogue
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=5 left-column right-indent aligned-line longer-tail headchar-capital

column2: management.
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=5 left-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period above-blank-line above-double-space above-line-space

column2: 1. INTRODUCTION
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=5 left-column right-indent font-largest aligned-line longer-tail line-blank-line line-double-space line-space itemization

column2: An LCS system listens for information requests, communicates
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=5 left-column full-justified aligned-line longer-tail headchar-capital

column2: both with the user and networked information resources, and
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: shows a tailored visualization to the individual user. The
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: LCS-Marine system employs a spoken language understanding
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-capital

column2: system (SLS) for assisting the user in placing a request and
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: mobile, intelligent agents for information access to implement
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: the LCS paradigm. The SLS converses with the user to generate
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: a request or to check status, amend, or cancel an existing
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column full-justified aligned-line itemization headchar-lower

column2: request. Once sufficient information is obtained from the user,
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-comma

column2: the SLS launches an agent to accomplish the requested task.
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-period

column2: The agent accesses the appropriate databases via whatever
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-capital

column2: network services are available (including existing tactical
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: communications networks). Once the agent's tasks are
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: complete, it returns to the SLS, which generates an appropriate
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=8 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: response to the user. The response may be visual, verbal, or a
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=8 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: combination, depending on the available devices.
column3: page=0 xpos=0 ypos=8 left-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period column-bottom

column2: 2. SYSTEM OVERVIEW
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column right-indent font-largest column-top itemization

column2: The LCS-Marine system consists of four major components: an
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column right-over aligned-line longer-tail headchar-capital

column2: SLS, a collection of agents for information access, real-world
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column right-over aligned-line headchar-capital

column2: operational databases, and communications networks t o
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column right-over aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: connect the user to the SLS and the agents to the databases.
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column right-over aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-period

column2: The underlying architecture for the system is the MIT Galaxy II
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column right-over aligned-line headchar-capital

column2: conversational architecture [3]. It is a distributed, component-
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column right-over aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: based middleware product designed to be Òplug and playÓ.
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column right-over aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-period

column2: Specialized servers handle specific tasks, such as translating
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column right-over aligned-line headchar-capital

column2: audio data to text. All Galaxy II-compliant servers com-
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column right-over aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: municate with each other through a central server known as the
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column right-over aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: Hub. The Hub manages flow control, handles traffic among
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=4 right-column right-over aligned-line headchar-capital

column2: distributed servers, and provides state maintenance.
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=4 right-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period above-double-space above-line-space

column2: In the SLS, speech is sent from the Audio I/O server to the
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=4 right-column right-over aligned-line longer-tail line-double-space line-space headchar-capital

column2: Recognizer. The top n recognitions are then parsed, prior
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=4 right-column right-over aligned-line headchar-capital

column2: context added, and processed using the Natural Language
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=4 right-column right-over aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: (NL) servers (Frame Construction and Context Tracking) t o
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=5 right-column right-over aligned-line

column2: verify the new input's validity and context. The Turn Manager
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=5 right-column right-over aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: (TM) determines how to proceed with the conversations and
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=5 right-column right-over aligned-line

column2: generates a response. NL (Language Generation) converts it t o
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=5 right-column right-over aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: text and the Synthesis server generates the verbal response.
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=5 right-column right-over aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-period

column2: The audio server then speaks the waveform file to the user. We
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=5 right-column right-over aligned-line headchar-capital

column2: customize the various servers to work with domain specific
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=5 right-column right-over aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: issues and application-specific information and training.
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=6 right-column right-over aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-period

column2: Figure 1 shows our LCS architecture.
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=6 right-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail string-figure headchar-capital tailchar-period above-double-space above-line-space

column2: __Figure 1__
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=6 right-column left-over right-over box longer-tail line-double-space line-space figure-area above-double-space above-line-space

column2: Figure 1. The LCS-Marine architecture.
column3: page=0 xpos=6 ypos=9 right-column left-indent right-indent font-smaller indented-line shorter-tail line-double-space line-space string-figure headchar-capital tailchar-period above-blank-line above-double-space above-line-space

column2: We have integrated an additional server into the architecture
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=9 right-column right-over hanged-line longer-tail line-blank-line line-double-space line-space headchar-capital

column2: to support information accessÑan Agent server. The Agent
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=9 right-column right-over aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: server manages a collection of agents that can be tasked t o
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=9 right-column right-over aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: accomplish a variety of missions, including migration t o
column3: page=0 xpos=5 ypos=9 right-column right-over aligned-line headchar-lower page-bottom

column2: distant machines with possibly different operating systems t o
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=0 left-column full-justified page-top headchar-lower

column2: gather information or to monitor and report events [2].
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=0 left-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period above-double-space above-line-space

column2: Typically, the Agent server receives its tasking from the TM
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=0 left-column full-justified aligned-line longer-tail line-double-space line-space headchar-capital

column2: and supplies the TM with information from the data source(s).
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=0 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-period

column2: For persistent tasks, the Agent server becomes the initiator of a
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=0 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-capital

column2: dialogue to inform the user of specific events by passing agent
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=0 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: reports to the TM. When a visual display is present, the Agent
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=1 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: server will dispatch an agent to pass the updated information
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=1 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: to the display machine.
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=1 left-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period above-double-space above-line-space

column2: For the LCS-Marine application our agents had to interact
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=1 left-column full-justified aligned-line longer-tail line-double-space line-space headchar-capital

column2: with a logistics database that could be between one to one
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=1 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: hundred miles away. We later describe how our agents were
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=1 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: able to reach this live database over the tactical communication
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=2 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: links available.
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=2 left-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period above-double-space above-line-space

column2: Users interact with the LCS-Marine system using the voice
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=2 left-column full-justified aligned-line longer-tail line-double-space line-space headchar-capital

column2: capture device appropriate to their organization (telephone,
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=2 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-comma

column2: cell phone, tactical radios, computer headsets, etc.).
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=2 left-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period above-blank-line above-double-space above-line-space

column2: 3. MARINE COMBAT SERVICE SUPPORT
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=3 left-column right-indent font-largest aligned-line longer-tail line-blank-line line-double-space line-space itemization above-line-space

column2: PROBLEM
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=3 left-column left-indent right-indent font-largest indented-line shorter-tail line-space headchar-capital

column2: Marines work in a dynamic, fluid environment where
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=3 left-column full-justified hanged-line longer-tail headchar-capital

column2: requirements and priorities are constantly subject to change.
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=3 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-period

column2: Under current operations, it might take up to 72 hours before a
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=3 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-capital

column2: Marine in a Combat Service Support Operations Center
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-capital

column2: (CSSOC) can confirm with a requesting unit that their order i s
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column full-justified aligned-line

column2: in the logistics system. This is due to a lack of resources
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: available to the tactical units as well as a difficulty in turning
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: logistics data into information to enable timely analysis and
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: decision making. For Marines conducting tactical operations,
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-comma

column2: these restrictions and limited visibility into the supply chain
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: hamper logistics planning, decision, execution, and assess-
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=5 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: ment. Figure 2 shows the various echelons involved in tactical
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=5 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: Marine logistics operations. It is noteworthy that tactical
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=5 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-capital

column2: units have no organic means of accessing the logistical
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=5 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: databases other than via radio contact with personnel at the
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=5 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: CSSOC.
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=5 left-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-capital tailchar-period above-double-space above-line-space

column2: The focus of the LCS-Marine project is to provide Marines i n
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column full-justified aligned-line longer-tail line-double-space line-space headchar-capital

column2: the field with this missing visibility into the supply chain. By
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: using standard radio protocols and a common form, Marines
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: can now converse with a system that understands their task
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: and end goal and can assist them in getting both the
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: information and supplies they need. Figure 3 shows a sample of
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: the Rapid Request form, used when placing an order.
column3: page=1 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period column-bottom

column2: Supporting the LCS-Marine domain required understanding
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=0 right-column full-justified column-top headchar-capital

column2: and using proper radio protocols to communicate. It required
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=0 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: the system to understand call signs, military times, grid
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=0 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: coordinates, and special ordinance nomenclature. Additional-
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=0 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: ly, to fully support the dynamic environment, LCS-Marine
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=0 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: needed the ability to understand and translate usages of the
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=0 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: military phonetic alphabet. This alphabet is used to spell
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=0 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: difficult or unusual words. For example, to give the point of
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=1 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: contact for the request as Sergeant Frew, the user could say: Ò P
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=1 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: O C is Sergeant I spell Foxtrot Romeo Echo Whiskey over.Ó
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=1 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-capital

column2: LCS-Marine would convert the phonetic words to the proper
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=1 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-capital

column2: letter combination. This way the vocabulary is potentially
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=1 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: much larger than that used for system training.
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=1 right-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period above-double-space above-line-space

column2: Supporting the dynamic aspects of the Marine environment, the
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column full-justified aligned-line longer-tail line-double-space line-space headchar-capital

column2: system is speaker independent. This is critical in applications
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: where the user may change and there is no additional time for
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: training the system for a new operator.
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period above-double-space above-line-space

column2: The recognizer is trained on the domain vocabulary, but not o n
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column full-justified aligned-line longer-tail line-double-space line-space headchar-capital

column2: individual operator voices. The system also fully supports
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=2 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: natural, conversational dialogue, i.e., the recognizer expects
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: utterances at a normal rate of speech and the speaker does not
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: need to enunciate each syllable.
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period above-double-space above-line-space

column2: It is important to note that the amount of time spent training
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column full-justified aligned-line longer-tail line-double-space line-space headchar-capital

column2: personnel to use the LCS-Marine system is generally less than
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: 10 minutes. After a short introduction, the user is shown a
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=4 right-column full-justified aligned-line numbered-heading1

column2: sample dialogue for familiarization. The user is also given
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=4 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: information about meta-instructions Ð how to start over or t o
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=4 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: clear their previous statement Ð before they begin operation.
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=4 right-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period above-blank-line above-double-space above-line-space

column2: 4. OPERATIONAL EVALUATION
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=4 right-column right-indent font-largest aligned-line shorter-tail line-blank-line line-double-space line-space itemization

column2: To measure the effectiveness of the LCS paradigm under
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=5 right-column full-justified aligned-line longer-tail headchar-capital

column2: operational conditionsÑreal users placing real requests,
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=5 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-comma

column2: accessing a live database, and using existing communications
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=5 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: linksÑwe conducted a series of Integrated Feasibility
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=5 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: Experiments (IFE). The IFEs ranged from a pilot study that
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=5 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-capital

column2: featured scripted dialogue, replicated databases, and testing i n
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=5 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: the lab with prior military personnel, to field experiments
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=5 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: where active duty Marines used the system operationally over
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=6 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: a series of days as their sole means of interaction with the
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=6 right-column full-justified aligned-line itemization headchar-lower

column2: logistics system for rapid requests. We tested the systemÕs
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=6 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: support of placing and checking on requests for ammunition
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=6 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: (Class V), fuels (Class III), and subsistence (Class I) supplies.
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=6 right-column full-justified aligned-line tailchar-period

column2: More on the experimentation protocols can be found in [1] and
column3: page=1 xpos=5 ypos=6 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-capital
page=1 xpos=5 ypos=7 right-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail tailchar-period column-bottom above-double-space above-line-space

column2: __Figure 2__
column3: page=1 xpos=1 ypos=7 single-column centered left-indent right-indent box column-top line-double-space line-space figure-area above-line-space

column2: Figure 2. The Marine logistics ordering chain.
column3: page=1 xpos=3 ypos=9 single-column centered left-indent right-indent font-smaller indented-line shorter-tail line-space string-figure headchar-capital tailchar-period page-bottom

column2: __Figure 3__
column3: page=2 xpos=2 ypos=-7 single-column centered left-indent right-indent box page-top figure-area above-double-space above-line-space

column2: Figure 3. Partially Complete Rapid Request Form along with a portion of the database.
column3: page=2 xpos=1 ypos=0 single-column centered left-indent right-indent font-smaller hanged-line longer-tail line-double-space line-space string-figure headchar-capital tailchar-period column-bottom above-blank-line above-double-space above-line-space

column2: Over the course of the IFE process we were able to experiment
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=0 left-column full-justified column-top line-blank-line line-double-space line-space headchar-capital

column2: with differing server configurations as well as varying com-
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=0 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: munications linkages between servers. The most recent IFE
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=1 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: (December 2000) used the server layout shown in Figure 4.
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=1 left-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail year tailchar-period above-double-space above-line-space

column2: __Figure 4__
column3: page=2 xpos=-1 ypos=1 left-column full-justified box aligned-line longer-tail line-double-space line-space figure-area above-double-space above-line-space

column2: Figure 4. The physical LCS-Marine server layout.
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=5 left-column centered left-indent right-indent font-smaller indented-line shorter-tail line-double-space line-space string-figure headchar-capital tailchar-period above-blank-line above-double-space above-line-space

column2: The ideal configuration of the system would have a Marine
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=5 left-column full-justified hanged-line longer-tail line-blank-line line-double-space line-space headchar-capital

column2: using their organic communications system calling in to a
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: remote location and communicating with the SLS there. This
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: would not add any additional cost or hardware to the existing
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: Marine infrastructure. This operational layout is depicted i n
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-capital

column2: Figure 5. Unfortunately, the current tactical radio, the Single
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column full-justified aligned-line string-figure headchar-capital

column2: Channel Ground and Airborne Radio System (SINCGARS),
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-capital tailchar-comma

column2: can create a large amount of channel noise, which alters or
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: distorts the acoustic signal. Current recognizers can not yet
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: compensate for this distortion, although there is active
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=8 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: research into solving this problem.
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=8 left-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period above-double-space above-line-space

column2: We used a second operational layout to test the system and get
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=8 left-column full-justified aligned-line longer-tail line-double-space line-space headchar-capital

column2: operator feedback on using a spoken language understanding
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=9 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: interface. This layout is depicted in Figure 6. In this layout, we
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=9 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: required the user to beat the same location as the entire SLS
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=9 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: system and the agents migrated over the SINCGARS data link
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=9 left-column right-indent aligned-line headchar-lower column-bottom

column2: __Figure 5__
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=0 right-column centered left-indent right-indent box column-top figure-area above-double-space above-line-space

column2: Figure 5. The ideal LCS-Marine operational layout.
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=3 right-column centered left-indent right-indent font-smaller indented-line shorter-tail line-double-space line-space string-figure headchar-capital tailchar-period above-double-space above-line-space

column2: __Figure 6__
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=4 right-column centered left-over box hanged-line longer-tail line-double-space line-space figure-area above-double-space above-line-space

column2: Figure 6. The LCS-Marine actual operational layout.
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=8 right-column centered left-indent right-indent font-smaller indented-line shorter-tail line-double-space line-space string-figure headchar-capital tailchar-period above-blank-line above-double-space above-line-space

column2: to reach the logistics database. The recognizer still had t o
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=9 right-column full-justified hanged-line longer-tail line-blank-line line-double-space line-space headchar-lower

column2: contend with the issue of a noisy and dynamic background,
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=9 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-comma

column2: but the acoustic distortion was eliminated.
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=9 right-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period page-bottom

column2: 5. CONCLUSION
column3: page=3 xpos=0 ypos=0 left-column right-indent font-largest page-top itemization

column2: We have built a system that integrates a spoken language
column3: page=3 xpos=0 ypos=0 left-column full-justified aligned-line longer-tail headchar-capital

column2: understanding system with a mobile, intelligent agent system
column3: page=3 xpos=0 ypos=1 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: that allows users in a hostile acoustic environment to place
column3: page=3 xpos=0 ypos=1 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: and access data requests via a conversational interface. LCS-
column3: page=3 xpos=0 ypos=2 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: Marine is speaker independent and requires little training. The
column3: page=3 xpos=0 ypos=2 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-capital

column2: time to accomplish a task is significantly lower than the
column3: page=3 xpos=0 ypos=3 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: manual input method it seeks to enhance, but it can still be
column3: page=3 xpos=0 ypos=3 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: improved. Being able to rapidly access, insert, modify, and
column3: page=3 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: delete requests gives the users greater visibility into the
column3: page=3 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: supply system.
column3: page=3 xpos=0 ypos=5 left-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period above-blank-line above-double-space above-line-space
